channel.title: Joplin on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Joplin on Deuts Log

item.title: Make Joplin work with Nginx Proxy Manager and Duplicati (Docker)
item.description: A guide on setting up a Joplin server using Docker Compose, including benefits like faster syncing, easy note sharing, and user access. It covers steps for creating a Docker network, configuring Nginx Proxy Manager, setting up the app and database, and managing backups with Duplicati. Troubleshooting steps for connection issues between Joplin and PostgreSQL are also provided.
